# Random walk

Creating random walk in Z Plane

preliminaries
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

Function for Random Walk
k: Initial state n: Number of steps

```{r}
options <- list(
    c(0, 0),
    c(1, 0),
    c(0, 1),
    c(-1, 0),
    c(0, -1),
    c(1, 1),
    c(-1, -1),
    c(-1, 1),
    c(1, -1)
)

simulate_random_walk <- function(k, n) {
    i <- 0
    state <- k

    plot(0, 0, xlim = c(-100, 100), ylim = c(-100, 100), col = "red", pch = 19)

    for (i in 1:n) {
        i <- i + 1

        move <- sample(options, 1)[[1]]
        state_old <- state
        state <- state + move
        lines(c(state[1], state_old[1]), c(state[2], state_old[2]), col = "blue")
    }
}
```


Call the Function, and adjust parameters

```{r}
k <- c(0, 0)
n <- 5000

simulate_random_walk(k, n)
```
